K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:339b-0: @339b rgya gar fskad du; badzra s'ukshma aa pra ti ha ta n'a ma dh'a ra n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:339b-2: rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:339b-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:339b-4: bde gshegs khro bo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:339b-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:339b-6: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:339b-7: sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje h'um zhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar ba bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:339b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u cig byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-2: gsang ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-6: lha'i gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-7: klu nyam chung ba la zil gyis gnon pa drag pos rab tu gzhom pa'i gsang sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-8: rig sngags gzungs sngags rnams rab tu brjod du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-9: lag na rdo rjes smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-10: bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-11: nga yis bde gshegs khro bo thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying 'di rab tu smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-12: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-13: na mashtsanda badzra p'a na ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-14: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-16: aom ha ra ha ra badzra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-22: d'a ra ya d'a ra ya badzra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-23: d'a ru na d'a ru na badzra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-27: na mashtsanda badzra kro dh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-32: aa mri te h'um phat th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-33: bram ze'i khye'u gang la la zhag gis bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i cha bzung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-34: khro bo thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340a-35: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur spros na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-0: sems can @340b thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-1: tshe dang bsod nams rab tu rgyas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-4: dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par thar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-5: gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la rtsi ma gi ta sprin gyis bshig pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-6: skyu ru ra rlon pa gser gyis gzhibs pa bzhin du dmigs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-8: rdo rje phra mo spros pas de dag gi phung po lnga dbang po lnga myur du brlag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-9: lhas smras na lha'i zla ba gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-10: lo lnga na lha ma yin mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-12: bdud kyi mtshon cha rnams myur du btul bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-13: mis brjod na gang la dmigs pa de mi'i zla ba gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-14: mi'i lo lnga na nges par brlag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-16: bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-17: de nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i skad phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-18: rdo rje'i tshig 'di lha gnas gsum por bsgrags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-094-006:340b-19: rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
